description:
As her friends work on Shirobaco`s third-anniversary menu, Maia digs into DEAVA`s history in an effort to save Akira. Her search leads her back to Nesta, where she learns more of her own history than she ever wanted to know...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Know It! The Reason You Were Born
知れ! 生まれた意味
